alert.note: Alert for Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 11 at 2:23PM MDT until October 11 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PLATTE COUNTY... At 223 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Guernsey Campground, or 19 miles north of Wheatland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Guernsey, Guernsey Campground and Hartville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
